call_reason: Was asking about the expired Aquaspray X promotion.
details: Customer inquired about a recently expired promotional offer on the Aquaspray X robotic washer. Explained that the promotion had ended and recommended joining the mailing list to receive notifications on future deals. Customer accepted the suggestion. No further issues were reported. Resolution was expected immediately as no follow-up action was required.
